attributes.action: Award Marcus Rashford with a Knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Marcus Rashford has been a steadfast supporter of all young people, and his selfless determination to promote,  support and develop programmes, strategies and policies to enable the most disadvantaged reach their potential. This has been alongside his incredible football success and he has used his fame, philanthropy and success to invest in those who invested in him as a child, growing up in challenging circumstances. Marcus Rashford is a real role model for young people to emulate, and a Knighthood would crown his achievements.
attributes.background: Awarding Marcus Rashford with a Knighthood would recognise and reward his passion to enable all young people to reach their potential, and this highest accolade would act as an inspiration to others.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
